bpp/descriptor.name: Adya
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Adya is a universal open-source platform for commerce and supply chain. With its Platform-as-a-Service and integration-Platform-as-a-service capabilities, Siva is a truly interoperable solution, with more than 100 ready-made solutions at the door.

descriptor.name: Light Up Flash Face & Body Brightening Ubtan – 3 Minute Facial, Goat’s Milk, Marigold, Hibiscus, Rose, Guava & Vitamin C: Instant Glow, Tan Removal, Gentle Exfoliation, Natural Radiance, Bridal – 120 gm Scrub
descriptor.short_desc: BRIGHTENING AND NATURAL RADIANCE : 100 % Natural FLASH Ubtan works in 3 minutes to give natural daily glow. Goat’s Milk dissolves dead skin and Ethyl Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) naturally brightens your skin. GIVES INSTANT GLOW !
descriptor.long_desc:
DE-TANNING AND LIGHTENING: In this Ubtan Marigold lightens skin complexion and Turmeric reduces dark patches, spots and scars, giving your skin a golden glow.
FIGHTS FACE AND BODY ACNE: Lactic acid rich Goat’s Milk and New Zealand Glacial Clay control sebum production, remove excess oil and fight acne causing bacteria.
VERY INTENSE HYDRATION: Rose Petals when activated with water infuse natural oils that plump, fortify and provides an energizing burst of moisture. This scrub is truly a tall drink of water for dry, parched skin.
TIGHTENS AND FIRMS AGEING SKIN: This Scrub contains Crushed Hibiscus, Rosemary and Guava fight pre-mature ageing. Lifts and tightens skin giving you sculpted look.
HOW TO USE : Mix 2-3 scoops with water or milk. Apply all over face and neck. Rinse with water after 3 minutes and pat dry with towel.
All Light Up products are dermatologically tested, 100% cruelty free and is free of Parabens, Sulphates, Urea, Talc, Alcohol, Mineral oil and Phthalates.
Suitable for age groups, genders and skin types.

descriptor.name: Bella Vita Luxury Man Perfume Gift Set 4 x 20 ml for Men with KLUB, OUD, CEO, G.O.A.T Perfume | Woody, Citrusy Long Lasting EDP Fragrance Scent
descriptor.short_desc: A set of 4 mini perfumes, including the iconic fragrances of Dominus, Oud, CEO Man, and Impact Man.
descriptor.long_desc:
This gift set is perfect for men looking for affordable yet luxurious fragrances that make a long-lasting impression.
Each fragrance is carefully crafted to exude confidence, power, and sophistication, making them perfect for day and night wear.
The set is an ideal gift for a loved one or a perfect way to pamper yourself with unforgettable fragrances bound to turn heads.
Long-lasting luxury perfume gift set for man

descriptor.name: Minimalist Sunscreen SPF 50 Lightweight with Multi-Vitamins | No White Cast | Broad Spectrum PA ++++ | For Women & Men | 50g
descriptor.short_desc: Hydrating, Ultra Violate Protection, Soothing, Moisturizing, Nourishing
descriptor.long_desc:
>This sunscreen is formulated with 4 very effective UV-filters, namely, Uvinul T 150, Avobenzone, Octocrylene and Titanium Dioxide to provide protection from UVA & UVB
>Boosted with Vitamin A, B3, B5, E and F that not only repairs skin after sun exposure, but also soothes, nourishes and hydrates skin
Thoroughly tested by an independent lab and confirmed SPF of 50 was obtained
>It is a Photostable and does not leave any white cast on application
>Spreads easily like a lightweight moisturiser and does not leave behind unwanted residue or heavy feeling
>The primary filters are sourced from BASF, Germany and Royal DSM, Netherlands

descriptor.name: L'OREAL PROFESSIONNEL PARIS Absolut Repair Shampoo For Damaged & Weakend Hair, 300ML |Professional Hair Repairing Shampoo|Hair Strengthening Shampoo
descriptor.short_desc: Strengthens hair | Repairs each strand | Reconstructs core of hair |Protects hair from external damageStrengthens hair | Repairs each strand | Reconstructs core of hair |Protects hair from external damage
descriptor.long_desc: Expert nourishing shampoo to repair and hydrate damaged hair. Powered by gold quinoa and wheat protein, the L’Oréal Professionnel Serie Expert Absolut Repair nourishing hair shampoo helps repair damaged hair. It nourishes and strengthens the hair fiber leaving hair feeling soft and hydrated. For best results use with the Absolut Repair hair mask.

descriptor.name: Bella Vita Luxury Woman Eau De Parfum Gift Set 4x20 ml for Women with Date, Senorita, Glam, Rose Perfume|Floral, Fruity Long Lasting EDP Fragrance Scent
descriptor.long_desc:
This discovery set is perfect for women who want to indulge in luxury fragrances and explore different scents without committing to a full-size bottle.
The set is compact and easy to carry in a handbag, making it convenient for women to refresh their fragrances throughout the day.
With various scents that cater to all moods and occasions, this discovery set is perfect for gifting to a loved one or indulging yourself in a luxurious olfactory experience.
Long-lasting luxury perfume gift set for woman.
